body.name: Aptamil Gold+ ProNutra Biotik Stage 1 Infant Formula– 31.7 oz.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 15 hrs 13 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 15 hrs 13 mins
features: FDA permitted and now available for purchase in the US:that has been inspired by 50 years of advanced breastmilk research. Source Euromonitor International Limited; Among the brands of Follow-on Milk Formula. Based on data reported by Euromonitor International Limited, Packaged Food 2022 edition, value sales RSP, 2021 data. Aptamil includes Almiron, Aptamil, Bebilon, Gallia and Nutrilon.
Complete Nutrition for Baby: Aptamil Gold plus baby food is suitable for babies from birth to 12 months, featuring key vitamins & minerals found in breast milk
Supports Immune System, Brain & Eye Health: Aptamil Gold plus delivers DHA (Omega-3) to help support brain & eye development, and Vitamins C and D to help support the immune system
Dual Prebiotics and Probiotics: This baby formula includes prebiotics GOS and FOS and probiotic B. breve, to help support baby’s digestive health

Aptamil’s Quality Assurance: Aptamil is committed to producing quality formula. At every stage of its development, Aptamil formulations are crafted with the care and expertise that every parent and baby deserves, undergoing a comprehensive and complete series of checks to give families confidence in choosing Aptamil
Contains cow’s milk: Not intended for babies with cow's milk allergies. Contains milk, soy and fish oil ingredients.
body.description: Introducing Aptamil, the #1 formula brand in Europe. Aptamil® Gold+ 1 is a nutritionally complete, premium formulation tailored to meet the developing needs of babies 0-12 months, inspired by 40 years of research in early life science. Featuring prebiotics GOS and FOS and probiotic B. breve to help support digestive health, DHA (Omega-3) to help support brain & eye development, Vitamin C and D to help support the immune system, and key vitamins & minerals found in breast milk, Aptamil® Gold+ 1 Infant formula was developed by the passionate Aptamil team of more than 500 scientists and experts, to give your little one the nutrients they need to help them thrive.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #5,158 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #50 in Powder Baby Formula

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aptamil saved the day!
reviews.reviewText: This formula is better than any I’ve ever used. Our son is combo fed and Aptamil causes no discomfort in any way. Previously we struggled with Similac and Enfamil which both caused stomach upset. We tried Kendamil which seemed like a nice quality alternative, but that also causes stomach upset. Finally we lucked into Aptamil and won’t be looking back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to supplement my babies breast milk at first as he wasn’t gaining enough weight but I wanted something that didn’t have all of those extra added bad ingredients. This formula was great and baby loved it. I love that I can rest assured it didn’t have any additives and that it was comparable to breast milk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My supply went dry and this by far is the only one my baby has accepted she tried Efamil and similac and was burping alot but no with this one we love it and baby loves itPs I got them in clearance in Bjs ($13) that’s why I have so many lol Im not rich :)

reviews.reviewerName: Important Information Regarding Product Safety  I recently purchased product from and wanted to share an important piece of information with potential buyers. The product packaging included a warning dated about exposure to certain chemicals known to cause health issues. This disclosure was concerning and something I wish I had been aware of before making the purchase.  I believe it's crucial for fellow shoppers to be informed about such warnings, as they pertain to health and safety. While the product itself may meet certain standards, the presence of these chemicals is a matter that should be taken into consideration.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My baby's golden poop maker
reviews.reviewText: My baby had a problem with her poop while she was taking Similac (constipated). Got a recommendation from my friend whose baby was also having a same issue. After a week, my baby poops well & the poop is gold color!Cons: if you're using Brezza, highly recommend to shake a bit after it comes out. Sometimes the formula doesn't mix well with water :/

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After going through several different formulas to try to find the right one, six months of breast-feeding, and changing to formula can be very scary for a new mother we tried other brands but this brand by far is the best the closest to mothers milk by taste no problems with stomach spitting up diarrhea or any other issues. I love this product I would recommend it to as many people as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great formula! Great price
reviews.reviewText: Hands down the best formula. I unfortunately am a low supplier and wanted a good formula that was like breast milk to make it easier for my son. I found this and couldn't be happier. He did great on it and loved it. It is definitely worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great formula. My baby really loves it and has had zero problems with it.
We are using this formula after trying few other and my son is on this for couple of years now. Never had any issues with using this formula & my son is active and healthy.
Quick next day delivery. Product as described

After trying a few other brands, I was interested by the pre and pro biotics in Aptamil. My baby girl absolutely loved it, and truly thrived. Now my son loves it just as much. Would recommend to anyone!
My baby loves this formula! She drinks it since she was born.
I bought the aptamil gold from pharmacy before but I found this one cheaper to buy from you and great product too
